statements: DELETE FROM SurveyResponses WHERE participant_id = 123 AND age > 30 AND gender = 'Female'
DELETE FROM SurveyResponses WHERE profession = 'Engineer' AND education_level = 'Master' AND response_timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM research_studies WHERE ethics_approval = FALSE;
DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE participant_id = 123 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM research_studies WHERE researcher_id IN (SELECT researcher_id FROM research_studies WHERE study_name = 'Study A');
DELETE FROM researchers_survey_responses WHERE participant_id = 100 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 18;
